title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

altTitles.en: The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge

description.en:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class!?”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja: 「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」 　十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。 　だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。

description.en:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)

description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

title.en: It Was Love at First Sight, Mr. Villain!

description.en:
Duke Adler, referred to as the greatest man of the Asgard Empire, is as handsome as a sculpture. However, he is also a serial killer, playing the role of the villain in a novel. On top of that, Princess Charlotte, who was politically married to him, was fated to be murdered on their first night together.

The predicament is that I am the princess fated to die at his hands on that night.

"It's a political marriage, and it's not as if we want to see each other anyway, so let's just meet on our wedding day."

It was evident that the villain was displeased with the idea of marrying me. Hence, I made a decision.

"It was love at first sight. So, please go out with me!"

With only six months left until the wedding, I resolved to carry out an undercover investigation by pretending to date him. People wouldn't believe my words, so I had no choice but to gather evidence myself.

Even though she had planned to reveal the fact that he was a serial killer by hovering around him...

***

"You said you fell in love with me at first sight, so what were you doing here with another man?"

A cold voice flowed into my ears.

"W-What do you mean? I was just dancing to ensure there were no disruptions at the banquet..."

The nape of my neck heated up from the hot breath brushing against the outer edges of my ear. The contrast between his warm touches and the cool tone of his voice intoxicated me even more.

"You called his name so affectionately, as he held you tightly in his arms."
"Gasp."

Unable to escape the strong scent that clouded my senses, I held my breath. My whole body tingled from the strange sensation spreading from my neck to the rest of my body. He tilted his head and said...

"If there's someone else's scent coming from you... I'll have an urge to kill."

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___

“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en: Award-winning series by author and essayist Uchida Shungicu.  Starting in 1993 and still ongoing, this is a frank, sex-positive look at pregnancy, childbirth, child rearing, and single motherhood, notable for tackling such issues directly at a time when such treatments were rare. The series is tagged as Erotica because it has sex in it, but if you're looking for an erotic manga per se, you'll probably want to look elsewhere.

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

description.en:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
description.ja:
魔界の悪魔、通称「邪神ちゃん」は、ある日突然、人間界に召喚されてしまう。
彼女を召喚したのは、神保町のボロアパートで暮らす、ちょっとブラックな心を持つ女子大生、花園ゆりねだった。しかもゆりねは、邪神ちゃんを魔界に帰す方法がわからないと言う。仕方なく一緒に暮らし始めた邪神ちゃんとゆりね。しかし、召喚者が死ねば魔界に帰れることから邪神ちゃんはゆりねを……!?
少女と邪神ちゃんが繰り広げるちょっとキケンな同居生活コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Jashin-chan Dropkick é uma comédia violenta sobre uma lolita gótica, Yurine, que invoca uma garota demônio com um rabo de cobra, Jashin-chan.
Elas terão que viver juntas até que Yurine encontre uma maneira de enviar Jashin-chan de volta ao inferno, ou até que Jashin-chan mate Yurine.

description.en:
What should you do if transmigrated to a fantasy world and has become a son called the 'Human Race's Great Traitor'!

Don't worry, looking at his infinite epiphany system, all Bai Mo needs to do is to make others jealous of him!

No matter what kind of moves and cheats, as long as someone is jealous of him, Bai Mo can start an epiphany and let himself practice those to perfection in an instant!

So Bai Mo raised a lot of big villains around him, and occasionally molested them.

He liked to watch his enemies jealous and resentful of him, but they couldn't do that themselves!
description.id: Apa yang harus saya lakukan jika saya menjadi putra seorang yang dikenal sebagai pengkhianat umat manusia di dunia fantasi!  Jangan khawatir, melihat sistem pencerahannya yang tak terbatas, yang perlu dilakukan Bai Mo hanyalah membuat orang lain iri padanya!  Tidak peduli keterampilan atau buku rahasia apa pun, selama seseorang iri padanya, Bai Mo akan dapat membuka pencerahannya dan membiarkan dirinya mengembangkannya dengan sempurna dalam sekejap!  Oleh karena itu, Bai Mo telah mengangkat banyak penjahat besar di sekitarnya, dan sesekali menggodanya, dia suka melihat musuhnya iri dan membencinya, tetapi dia tidak bisa bertindak seperti dirinya sendiri!
description.zh: 越玄幻世界还变成了被称为人族大叛徒的儿子该怎么办！ 不急，看着自己的无限顿悟系统，白墨需要做的就是让别人嫉妒自己！无论何等功法、秘籍，只要有人嫉妒他，白墨就能开启顿悟，让自己瞬间将它修炼圆满！ 于是白墨身边养了很多大反派，偶尔调戏一下，就喜欢看着敌人嫉妒怨恨自己，却又干不了自己的样子！

Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!

altTitles.ja: 最凶の魔王に鍛えられた勇者、異世界帰還者たちの学園で無双する

altTitles.en: The Hero Trained by the Worst Demon King Is Unrivaled in the School of Returnees From Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Sai Kyō no Maō ni Kitae Rareta Yūsha, Isekai Kikan-sha-tachi no Gakuen de Musō Suru

altTitles.en: A Brave Man Trained by the Worst Demon King, Unrivaled in the School of Returnees From Another World

description.en:
Without possessing the unique skill blessed by the goddess, a boy named Kujou Kyouya failed to save the world. He was ridiculed as a “failed hero” at the interdimensional-level academy where returned heroes who had saved many worlds gathered.

However, he became the strongest and most unique hero, having trained for 30,000 years in another world with the most evil demon king, Felice, who has destroyed 3,000 worlds!

Now Kyouya’s unique skill is so powerful that he cannot even be defeated by the strongest heroes! The legend of a boy trained by the most evil demon king, begins!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58212),  [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1299578/vol_no/001)
description.id: Tanpa mendapatkan berkah kemampuan unik dari Dewa, anak laki-laki bernama Kujou Kyouya gagal menyelamatkan dunia. Dia diejek sebagai "pahlawan gagal" di akademi level interdimensi di mana pahlawan yang telah menyelamatkan banyak dunia berkumpul. Meski begitu dia dapat menjadi pahlawan terkuat dan terunik, setelah berlatih selama 30.000 tahun di dunia lain dengan Raja Iblis paling jahat, Felice, yang telah menghancurkan 3.000 dunia! Sekarang dengan kemampuan uniknya Kyouya sangat kuat yang bahkan tidak akan bisa dikalahkan oleh pahlawan terkuat sekalipun! Legenda tentang anak laki-laki yang dilatih Raja Iblis paling jahat, dimulai!

altTitles.ja: 野犬

description.en: A Taki x Raana Doujin

altTitles.th: เซียนเกมรักขอเป็นเทพนักจีบ

altTitles.ja: 神のみぞ知るセカイ

altTitles.vi: Thế giới chỉ có Thánh thần biết

altTitles.ja: 神のみ

description.en:
Keima Katsuragi is a high school student better known online as the "God of Conquest," the man who can obtain the heart of any dating sim girl. In his opinion, real life is an awful game; three-dimensional girls are annoying and false representations of how a real girl should be.  
  
One afternoon, while taking a break from cleaning duty, he stumbles across a strange message that goads him to conquer a girl. On a whim, he accepts, and his consent summons a girl named Elucia "Elsie" de Lute Ima, a denizen of hell tasked with capturing runaway spirits that have festered in girls' hearts. Keima is shocked and tries to escape, but Elsie tells him that failure in fulfilling the newly-formed contract will result in the termination of his life!   
  
Tasked with capturing the runaway spirits, Keima uses his expertise and knowledge of dating sims to obtain the hearts of girls in real life.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **The World God Only Knows** (2012)
description.pl: Czy nieuleczalny otaku może być idealnym facetem? Dowód na to, że wbrew pozorom manga opierająca się na haremie może być oryginalna.
description.ru:
Кацураги Кейма – мастер обольщения, который знает сотни приемов, как влюбить в себя девушку, с легкостью предугадывает каждый её шаг и называет себя Богом-Обольстителем.   
А ведь именно такого ищут… в аду, откуда сбежало множество душ, что закрадываются в сердца невинных девушек и преспокойно там живут. И по мнению здешнего руководства, Кацураги и есть тот единственный, кто может покорить сердце жертвы, освободив от сбежавшей души, а посему заключают с ним договор.   
Но они просчитались в одном - Кацураги обожает виртуальных девушек, а живых, настоящих, считает мусором, не достойных его божественного внимания. Однако ему придется что-то срочно придумать, иначе он лишится головы.
description.pt-br: Katsuragi Keima é conhecido como o Deus da Conquista nos jogos de namoro 2D, Um dia ele recebe um contrato em forma de e-mail do chefe dos demônios desafiando ele a conquistar um certo tipo de garota, pensando ele ser um desafio de mais outro jogo ele aceita o contrato, e a partir dai com a ajuda (ou não) de Elsie, ele é forçado a conquistar garotas reais para não perder a cabeça, que é o que acontece se ele quebrar o contrato. Katsuragi Keima é conhecido como o Deus da Conquista nos jogos de namoro 2D, Um dia ele recebe um contrato em forma de e-mail do chefe dos demônios desafiando ele a conquistar um certo tipo de garota, pensando ele ser um desafio de mais outro jogo ele aceita o contrato, e a partir dai com a ajuda (ou não) de Elsie, ele é forçado a conquistar garotas reais para não perder a cabeça, que é o que acontece se ele quebrar o contrato.

description.en: The manga's story begins when a peasant named Hanbē asks a girl named O-haru for her hand in marriage, but O-haru confesses that she is already thinking of another man named Masakichi from a neighboring village. When Hanbē seeks out Masakichi, he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it, despite being a peasant.
description.ru: Крестьянин по имени Ханбэй делает предложение руки и сердца девушке по имени Охару, однако она признаётся, что влюблена в другого парня, Масакити, живущего в соседней деревне. Когда Ханбэй отправляется на поиски Масакити, чтобы сразиться с ним, он обнаруживает, что тот умело обращается с мечом, несмотря на то, что он тоже крестьянин. Во время их схватки они слышат крик тонущей девочки, которая просит о помощи, после чего вдвоём бросаются на помощь, в процессе чего погибают в бурном потоке реки. После смерти оба парня оказываются в той самой, всем хорошо знакомой комнате.

altTitles.ja: ミックス

description.en:
Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch.  
  
Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.  
  
Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship.  
  
(Source: MAL, edited)
description.ja: 舞台は明青学園。同年同月同日に生まれた同い年の兄弟とひとつ違いの妹。上杉兄弟の伝説から２６年、運命の兄弟は今再び明青学園の扉を開く。そして、物語は始まる―――

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja: 魔界の主役は我々だ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

altTitles.en: The Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

description.ja: 最強ギルドを追放された料理人・デニス。彼は奴隷少女のアトリエとともに『冒険者食堂』を開店させるのだった。至高の料理スキルを活かした庶民的で温かいデニスの料理は、ちょっとアレな冒険者たちの心と身体を癒やしていくが……。

description.en:
Nigris, an adventurer who has a rare "appraisal" skill and specializes in "healing magic." He supported the S-rank party behind the scenes, but was deemed incompetent and exiled. Nigris begins his career as a solo adventurer with a fresh start, but his destiny begins to change when he meets the elf slave girl Fels and the thunder master Alisa. "Wha, what is this power...!" Nigris' talent blooms, and they demonstrate incredible power! Together with his trusted companions, Nigris will make a name for himself as an adventurer. Nigris and his friends, who are unrivaled with unstoppable momentum that surpasses even S-rank parties, eventually get involved in a riot that threatens the country!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2881ha/)

title.en: A Story About a Stalker Woman and a Smiling Man

altTitles.ja: ストーカー女と笑顔男の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Stalker Onna to Egao Otoko no Hanashi

description.en: Yul, the manager of the interdimensional dump truck office, accidentally kills an innocent man named Kwon Yoo-jun. In order to make amends, Yul enters a romance fantasy novel where Yoo-jun is the villainess and tries to send her back to her original world. However, due to various complications, Yul becomes trapped in the novel. With the office staff scattered and no knowledge of the novel's plot, Yul desperately searches for a way out. But, Yoo-jun, who is now pretending to be a noble lady in the new world, causes Yul a headache.

altTitles.ja: 光が死んだ夏

altTitles.de: Der Sommer, in dem Hikaru starb

altTitles.th: หน้าร้อนที่ฮิคารุจากไป

altTitles.pt-br: O verão em que Hikaru morreu

altTitles.es: El verano en que Hikaru murió

altTitles.it: L’estate in cui Hikaru è morto

description.en:
"So, Hikaru is no more... If that's true then..."

Yoshiki and Hikaru are two boys who live in a certain village. They're the same age and have always been together growing up. But one day, Yoshiki noticed that "something else" has taken Hikaru's place. Even after learning of this, Yoshiki still wants them to be together. And so, his life with the "something" that looks like his friend begins.

At the same time, strange incidents keep occurring in the village...
description.fr: Hikaru et Yoshiki sont deux amis d'enfance qui ont grandi ensemble dans un hameau reculé. Mais un jour, les doutes qu'éprouvait Yoshiki depuis quelque temps se confirment : depuis sa disparition en forêt, six mois plus tôt, Hikaru a été remplacé par... "autre chose". Malgré cet effroyable constat, Yoshiki refuse d'être séparé de son ami. Il fait alors le choix de poursuivre son quotidien aux côtés de cet "être" à l'image parfaite de Hikaru. Mais au même moment, d'étranges incidents se produisent çà et là dans le village...
description.es-la:
“Así que, Hikaru ya no está… Si eso es verdad, entonces…” 

Yoshiki y Hikaru son dos chicos que viven en cierto pueblo. Tienen la misma edad y siempre han estado juntos mientras crecían. Pero, un día, Yoshiki se da cuenta que “una cosa” tomó el lugar de Hikaru. Incluso después de saber eso, Yoshiki aún quiere que estén juntos. Y así, su vida con esa “cosa” que se parece a su amigo comienza. 

Al mismo tiempo, incidentes extraños continúan ocurriendo en el pueblo...

altTitles.ja: 夏の終点

description.en: Natsukawa, a member of the beautification committee, often finds her gaze lingering on her schoolmate Aihara. One fateful day off, she spots Aihara walking alongside another girl... As summer’s heat stirs the air, a delicate tale of first love begins to take shape...

title.en: Watashi ga Koibito ni Nareru Wake Naijan, Muri Muri! (Muri Janakatta!?)

altTitles.ja: わたしが恋人になれるわけないじゃん、ムリムリ！（※ムリじゃなかった!?）

altTitles.id: Mana Mungkin Aku Bisa Jadi Kekasihmu! (Ternyata Mungkin!?)

altTitles.zh: 我怎么可能成为你的恋人，不行不行！（※不是不可能！？）

altTitles.zh-hk: 我怎麼可能成為你的戀人，不行不行！（※不是不可能！？）

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zěnme kěnéng chéngwéi nǐ de liànrén, bùxíng bùxíng!(※Bùshì bù kěnéng!?)

altTitles.en: There’s No Freaking Way I’ll be Your Lover! Unless…

description.en:
Longing to be a normie, I, Renako Amaori, am finally making my high school debut after working so hard for it. However due to my communication impairment, I have a gloomy aura. And after being in the normie group day in day out, I got so exhausted and said “I can't do this anymore,” and reached my limit!

During that time, I accidentally met the top student of our school. Perfect in face and figure, unrivaled in sword and pen, our school's best high school girl: Mai Odzuka.
We found in each other someone who we could open to and talk about our own troubles. What a nice friend I made, now I can surely get back on my own feet…is what I thought!

"It seems that you, even as a girl, have made me fall in love with you."
What!? Mai suddenly confessed to me. Wait! What about our friendship?

And so, we now have different feelings we can’t tell each other: friendship or a romantic relationship. We’re now presenting each other its benefits and put them into practice to see what kind of relationship works best for us. Will I succeed with a successful high school life…?
description.pt-br: A desajeitada e introvertida Amaori Renako está deixando sua vida solitária no ensino médio para trás, determinada a se tornar uma estudante extrovertida e popular. A glamorosa e confiante Oduka Mai é o oposto total de Renako: rica, despreocupada e literalmente uma modelo fashion. Contra todas as probabilidades, as duas garotas formam uma conexão imediata. Renako acha que pode ter encontrado a melhor amiga dos seus sonhos… até que a confissão de amor de Mai deixa seus sentimentos em parafuso. Renako quer provar a Mai que ser melhores amigas é melhor do que ser namoradas, mas Mai está decidida a convencer Renako de que elas estão destinadas a serem amantes!

description.en: Crybaby Xiao Yu together with the expressionless bad girl Xiao Xiao. Two different personalities seeking comfort in each other.
description.zh: 哭包小雨和压抑情感的不良少女笑笑, 两个有性格缺陷的女孩的互相救赎

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染のお悩み

title.en: Nichiasa Suki no Otaku ga Akuyaku Seito ni Tenseishita Kekka, Hametsu Flag ga Houkaishiteiku Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.ja: ニチアサ好きのオタクが悪役生徒に転生した結果、破滅フラグが崩壊していく件について

altTitles.en: Regarding the Destruction of the Destruction Flag as a Result of a Nichiasa-Loving Otaku Being Reincarnated as a Villainous Student.

description.en:
Yugo Kurei is a high school student that loves tokusatsu hero shows. One day, he loses his life protecting a child from a street slasher, but he is reincarnated in another world as Yugo Clay, a character from a certain game. However, Yugo is the most disliked person in the school and is destined to die tragically... He was reincarnated as a villain, but with the new power of magic in his hands, he aims to become a hero!

"In this world, I can become the strongest hero!" A hero story of a tokusatsu otaku who rises from the bottom while crushing his doom flags!
description.ja:
日曜日の朝に放送されているヒーロー番組をこよなく愛している高校生・呉井雄悟。ある日、通り魔から子供を庇って命を落とすが、気づくと【ルミナス・ヒストリー】というゲームのキャラクター、ユーゴ・クレイとして異世界転生していた。しかし、ユーゴというキャラは学園一の嫌われ者で、ゆくゆくは無様に命を落とす運命・・・

そんな悪役キャラに転生したが、魔法という新たな力を手にしたことで、ヒーローになれる可能性に気づく！

「この世界なら俺は“本物”のヒーローになれる！」

description.en: A story about a girl that's friends with nature. Will she be strong enough to face her life that's full of difficulties? Or will she need nature's help?
description.id: Kisah seorang gadis yang berteman dengan sosok Alam. Apakah ia cukup kuat untuk menghadapi kehidupannya yang penuh dengan kemalangan? Ataukah ia akan memerlukan bantuan Sang Alam?

altTitles.ja: PICK ME UP～低レア★英雄の成り上がり～
ピックミーアップ！低レア英雄の成り上がり

altTitles.ja-ro: Pick Me up!! Tei Rea Eiyū No Nariagari

description.en:
1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss' attack patterns.

That was Seojin Han's philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he's got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.

Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?
description.pt-br:
No jogo de gacha mobile famoso por sua extrema dificuldade, o Mestre classificado em 5º lugar no mundo, "Loki" perde a consciência ao invadir a Masmorra.

"O quê? Eu sou um personagem de jogo agora?"

Depois de acordar, "Loki" percebe que ele se transformou em um Herói de Nível 1, 1 Estrela – 'Han Yslat'. Para retornar à Terra, ele deve liderar o Mestre e os heróis novatos e limpar o 100º andar da Masmorra!

"Você mexeu com o cara errado".

Esta é a história de transporte mais difícil  pelo Mestre Loki que nunca aceita uma única derrota.

altTitles.ja: ランカーの帰還

description.en:
During the early years of the hottest MMORPG called Arena, the world’s top ranker Meleegod vanished after setting every possible record in the virtual world.

In the real world, this deathly melee damage dealer was the happy-go-lucky Kang Hyeonu, who simply deleted his character and quit his hobby to finish mandatory military service and inherit his father’s company.

This rosy future dissolves within two years when a business rival makes his father go bankrupt. Hyeonu struggles to make ends meet with a string of part-time jobs, but his best friend has a better idea. He urges Hyeonu to conquer the Arena once again and earn a cushy living as a gaming celebrity.

Vowing to strike it rich and avenge his father, the former Meleegod returns to the Arena as a newbie. Only this time, he’s out for blood!

---

description.ja: バーチャルリアリティーゲーム「アレナ」の初期、最強最高のランカーだったメレーゴッド！ キャラクターを削除して忽然と姿を消していた彼が、人生のどん底から這い上がるためにまたアレナに戻ってきた！ 「感謝、絶望、復讐、全部晴らしてやる！」
description.ko:
가상현실게임 <아레나> 초창기,
최강최고의 랭커였던 밀리갓!

캐릭터를 삭제하고 홀연히 떠났던 그가
망해버린 집안을 일으키기 위해 다시 아레나에 돌아왔다!

“캐릭터를 생성하시겠습니까?”
description.ru:
В былые времена Миллигат был самым лучшим игроком и очень долгое время занимал первое место в мировом топе игры «Арена»...

Однажды, устав от Арены, он решил удалить свой аккаунт и заняться личной жизнью.

Прошло 2 года. Семья разрушена, бизнес потерян, и у него ничего не осталось...

От безысходности Миллигат решил вернуться туда, где всё начиналось... В Арену.

«Вы уверены, что хотите создать персонажа»?

Трепещите, мерзавцы и обычные игроки... Король вернулся.
description.zh: 虚拟现实游戏《幻神》创建初期最强最厉害的玩家，“米利神”高泽宇，曾经把角色删除后毫无留恋地离开了游戏，但为了拯救没落的家庭，他再次返回到此游戏当中…… “您要创建一个新角色吗？”

altTitles.th: นักรักโลกมายา
หน้ากากแก้ว

altTitles.ja: ガラスの仮面

description.en:
Chigusa Tsukikage holds the rights to the play "The Crimson Goddess," a lost masterpiece that many would love to see brought back to the stage.  
  
Tsukikage, however, won't allow the cherished work to be diminished by an actress who isn't worthy of playing the title role. Fortunately, she has found two young actresses that just might be worthy: Maya Kitajima and Ayumi Himekawa. Though both actresses are exceptionally talented, only one can win the coveted role.

---
- **Won the Japan Cartoonists Association Award in 1995**

---

altTitles.ja: ショタおに

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

altTitles.ja: 凍結したプレイヤーの帰還

altTitles.fr: Le retour du joueur qui était congelé
Le retour du joueur de gel

description.en:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

---

description.ja:
2019年世界は変わり、以前にはなかったゲート、モンスター、システム、プレイヤーのような概念が生まれた。 そこから5年間「侵略者」と「侵略を阻止する者」との戦いが世界各地で起きた。 そして世界を絶望に陥れた地球エリア最後のボス「氷の女王」により、5人のプレイヤーの内4人は氷の像となってしまう。 唯一ダンジョンに残された人類最高のプレーヤー、ダークネスは、氷の女王を倒すが、女王の能力を吸収する過程で彼もまた氷の像となった。氷の女王を倒すと、 長い眠りにつくという代価を払わなければならなかったのだー それから25年後…プレーヤーは目を覚ました。 「2階が出現し、計10階だと？1階の氷の女王を倒したら終わりじゃなかったのか？｣ この25年で人類が攻略できたのはたったの2階まで…。 伝説のプレイヤー「ダークネス」の名を捨て、新人プレーヤー伊坂圭として、仲間たちを救うため、彼は再びゲートに向かう！

description.ko:
세상이 바뀌고 5년.
최종보스가 나타났다.

[지구 에어리어의 최후의 보스, 서리여왕이 출현합니다.]

최후의 보스!
그녀만 처치하면 예전처럼 살 수 있다!

인류 최고의 플레이어, 어둑서니를 포함한 다섯 명의 플레이어가 마침내 서리여왕을 쓰러뜨리지만...
그들은 기나긴 잠에 빠지는 혹독한 대가를 치뤄야했다.
그로부터 25년 후.

"2층이라니? 서리여왕을 죽이면 끝나는 거 아니었어?"

얼어붙은 동료들을 구하기 위해,

그리고 세상을 구하기 위해.

전설이 된 어둑서니의 이름을 버리고
이제는 신입 플레이어 서준호로 돌아왔다.

description.ru:
В 2019 году мир переменился, и появились такие явления как: врата, монстры, система и игроки, - которых ранее не существовало. 
На протяжении 5 лет между человечеством и захватчиками происходила борьба за власть и территории.
[Финальный босс "Снежная королева" появился]
Если убить его, человечество сможет обрести свободу и вернуться к прежней жизни. 
24 ноября 2024 года четверо из 5 игроков вошли в последнее подземелье на Антарктиде, чтобы победить финального босса на территории Земли. Одним взмахом руки "Снежная королева" заморозила Тихий океан, повергнув человечество в отчаяние. 
Последнему игроку удалось победить финального босса, однако в процессе поглощения ее "ядра" он превратился в ледяную глыбу. А спустя 25 лет, когда поглощение завершилось, он очнулся от криогенного сна, получив фрост-способность EX-класса.

description.zh-hk:
世界發生了天翻地覆的變化，
在第5年時最終BOSS現身。
「地球區域最終BOSS，冰霜女王出現。」

最終BOSS!
只要除掉祂，就能回到過往的生活!

包含人類最強獵人——闇夜在內的五名獵人，
最終擊潰了冰霜女王...
但他們卻陷入長眠，付出了慘痛的代價。

之後過了25年...
「第2層?不是只要殺了冰霜女王，
一切就結束了嗎?」

為了拯救被冰封的夥伴；
為了拯救整個世界，
我拋下成為傳說的闇夜之名，
以本名徐俊昊，作為新人獵人歸來。

altTitles.ja: 8月31日のロングサマー

description.en:
Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition....

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
description.ja:
何度も繰り返す8月31日の中で出会った高校生の二人・鈴木くんと高木さん。

記憶を繰り越せるのは二人だけ。

タイムループの原因として考えられるのは、鈴木くんが夏休みにやり残した、男子最大の目標…。

恋と真っ向から対峙する、青春タイムループコメディ！
description.ru:
31 августа повторяется снова и снова. Сохранить об этом воспоминания могут только два школьника – Сузуки-кун и Такаги-сан. Задумавшись о причине возникновения такой временной петли, Сузуки-кун пришёл к выводу, что всё дело в нём: его незавершённых делах летом и большом сожалении на этот счёт. Чтобы выбраться из временной тюрьмы подросток решает действовать…
Вас ждёт любовная комедия противостояния любви и временной петли!
description.vi: Thế giới bị rơi vào 1 vòng lặp thời gian, chỉ có 2 người giữ lại được ký ức là Suzuki và Takagi. Nếu muốn thoát khỏi vòng lặp thì Suzuki phải hoàn thành ước nguyện còn dang dở của cậu: kiếm được bạn gái và thoát kiếp trai tân.

title.en: The Cool Girl Acts like a Cat Only for Me

altTitles.ja: クールな彼女は俺にだけねこちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: Cool na Kanojo wa ore ni Dake Neko-chan

altTitles.ja: 空の出会う場所で

description.en: Story of a man whose job description includes disposing of dead bodies, and the stray who blackmails him into sheltering him.
description.pt-br: Inoue trabalha se livrando de corpos... ele encontra um estranho rapaz misterioso que o faz acolhê-lo.

altTitles.ja: ムジナにの深い

description.en: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?
description.es: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?
description.ja: この世界に、私は”必要”かーー！？何気ない日常の中、刀を背に空を翔ぶ「ムジナ」と呼ばれる者の実体とは…？人間とは、社会とは、人権とは、そして幸せとは…
description.ru: История о юной девушке-убийце с катаной, которая охотится за своими целями в оживлённом столичном городе Цукумо.
description.es-la: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?

altTitles.en: The Blood Star Damned by Heaven

altTitles.pt-br: A Estrela de Sangue Amaldiçoada pelo Céu

description.en: Cheon Yoo-ok, a young orphan who survives by begging, however, as he delves deeper into the mysteries of a sect, dark secrets and unknown threats begin to emerge, in a world where intrigues and conspiracies are everywhere, he will have You have to overcome unimaginable challenges to protect those you love and discover your true destiny.
description.pt-br: Cheon Yoo-ok, um jovem órfão que sobrevive pedindo esmolas, porém, à medida que ele se aprofunda nos mistérios de uma seita, segredos sombrios e ameaças desconhecidas começam a surgir, em um mundo onde intrigas e conspirações estão por toda parte, ele terá que superar desafios inimagináveis para proteger aqueles que ama e descobrir seu verdadeiro destino.

description.en:
Two boys met on a stormy night: Tsukushi, a boy with no special traits at all, and Jin, a soccer genius. On that night, Jin drags Tsukushi into the world of high-school soccer.  
  
  
---
**Won the 40th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2016**
description.vi: Một câu chuyện đẹp về chàng trai nhỏ bé Tsukamoto, tuy cậu còn chả biết cầm bóng nhưng có niềm đam mê bóng đá bất tận, cùng với cậu bạn thiên tài là Kazama, họ vô tình gặp nhau, và cùng nhau chiến thắng! Đây là một manga rất là đáng để đọc, về tinh thần thể thao, về tình bạn, về những người luôn cố gắng vươn lên. Một câu chuyện truyền động lực và "sưởi hồn" đúng nghĩa...
description.pt-br: Dois garotos se reuniram em uma noite de tempestade: Tsukushi, um garoto sem características especiais em tudo, e Jin, um gênio do futebol. Naquela noite, Jin arrasta Tsukushi no mundo do futebol colegial.

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン カラー版

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!  
Now in Color!
description.fr:
Jeune homme fauché + démon-chien-tronçonneuse = Chainsaw Man!

Tout est dans le titre! La vie précaire de Denji change à jamais quand il fusionne avec son chien-tronçonneuse de compagnie, Pochita! Maintenant, il vit en centre-ville et est un Devil Hunter officiel. Mais il a beaucoup à apprendre de son nouveau job et de ses pouvoirs de tronçonneuse!
Maintenant en couleur!
description.kk: «Мен әрқашан қарапайым өмір сүруді армандадым: жылы төсекте ұйықтау, таңертең тосаппен нан жеу, қызыммен кездесуге бару және күнде күлімдеу. Әкемнің өлімімен кейін бәрі өзгерді - енді, Почита, өлтіретін кез келді!» - бұл сөзбен  Денжи өзінің шынжырлы иті Почитамен бірге басқа шартқа аттанады, өйткені олар сайтан аулаушылар. Күн сайын олар ақша үшін өлтіреді, оны Денджи бір якудзаға беруі керек, әйтпесе ол марқұм әкесінің қарызын өз өмірімен өтеуі керек. Бірақ Дэнджи барлық қарызын өтеген кезде оны не күтіп тұр: ол қарапайым өмір сүре ме, әлде әлемді сайтандардан құтқара ма? Мүмкін тағдырдың кейіпкерге қатысты өз жоспарлары бар шығар?
description.pt-br: Quando seu pai morreu, Denji ficou preso com uma dívida que era incapaz de pagar. Mas graças à ajuda de um cachorro demônio que ele salvou chamado Pochita, Denji é capaz de sobreviver como caçador de demônios de aluguel. Os poderes de serra elétrica do Pochita são bem poderosos contra estes demônios. E então, quando o Denji acaba sendo morto por um demônio, o Pochita desiste de sua vida para revivê-lo. Mas, agora o Denji renasceu como um hibrido de demônio com humano... Agora ele é o "Chainsaw Man"!

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
